title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Tenant blocks via admin submission
description:
Security teams can now block sender email addresses, domains, URLs and email attachments while making admin submission for email, URL and file attachment respectively.
More info: https://nam06.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftechcommunity.microsoft.com%2Ft5%2Fmicrosoft-defender-for-office%2Fintroducing-tenant-blocks-via-admin-submissions%2Fba-p%2F3604792&data=05%7C01%7Cv-begzaiem%40microsoft.com%7C3308930689f74
GA date: September CY2022
